price: ߢߌ߬ߡߦߊ߬ߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߟߍߙߊ ߛߊ߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߛߊ߲ߡߊߞߎ߬ߟߋߞߎ߬ߟߋ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߐ߫
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-abrāri lafī ʿilliyyīna
